results.overview: The co-founders of the Rocket Beans look back on their careers in this stage show performend on Mai 2019 inside the St. Pauli Theater in Hamburg. The B.E.A.N.S (Budi, Etienne, Arno, Nils, Simon) recapitulate their time at "GIGA Games", to "MTV's Game One", to their own 24 Hour Live-Stream Station in their typically unprofessional way. The anecdotes of the four and others of their creative circle are presented with photographs , videos & other time capsule like findings. All of this in a cozy atmosphere, couch to couch, in front of an audience and a carpet  found three days ago in their basement.
results.title: An Eve With Beans

results.overview: A young man falls in love with a ghost and must avoid a variety of ghostbusters out to eliminate her and each other.
results.title: A Chinese Ghost Story: The Tsui Hark Animation

results.overview: From the late 1960s to the early 1980s, Kong Xiu, an ordinary female worker, bravely got rid of the shackles of two unfortunate marriages, and grew up to be a writer in her spare time in the heavy workshop work.
results.title: A Woman

results.overview: At 80, Polidoro decides to demolish the stability of his comfortable life as a retired judge and become owner of a strip club.
results.title: Antes Que Eu Me Esqueça

results.overview: A 22-month anthropological expedition to the African continent with the 'Gauchos del Mar' brothers traveling in a 1985-model military ambulance from Spain to South Africa. The objective is to encourage human relationships through an unprecedented surfing exploration, promoting cultural exchange in this vast and diverse continent.
results.title: African Territory

results.overview: Sabine vows to give up married lovers, and is determined to find a good husband. Her best friend Clarisse introduces her to her cousin Edmond, a busy lawyer from Paris. Sabine pursues Edmond, with the encouragement of Clarisse, but Edmond does not seem very interested.
results.title: A Good Marriage

results.overview: Amelia and Pippo are reunited after several decades to perform their old music-hall act, imitating Fred Astaire and Ginger Rogers, on a TV variety show.
results.title: Ginger and Fred

results.overview: Alfredo, a timid young Italian, lusts after and woos the beautiful Maria Rosa. But when he manages to marry her, he discovers life is not nearly so blissful as he expected.
results.title: Alfredo, Alfredo

results.original_title: Friday the 13th: From Crystal Lake to Manhattan (Crystal Lake Victims Tell All - Documentary)
results.overview: Behind-the-scenes featurette detailing the production of the 'Friday The 13th' movies.
results.title: Friday the 13th: From Crystal Lake to Manhattan (Crystal Lake Victims Tell All - Documentary)

results.original_title: The Return of the Six-Million-Dollar Man and the Bionic Woman
results.overview: Ten years after his retirement from the government, Colonel Steve Austin must again team up with Jaime Sommers to stop a terrorist group. Complicating matters for Austin are his estranged son Michael, who struggles for his father's acceptance as he graduates from flight school, and Jaime, who must cope with her and Steve's past. When Michael is severely injured in a crash, Steve must make the same decision about fitting him with bionics that he had to make with Jaime years ago after her accident.
results.title: The Return of the Six-Million-Dollar Man and the Bionic Woman

results.original_title: You Can't Get Away with Murder
results.overview: Johnnie learns crime from petty thug Frank Wilson. When Wilson kills a pawnbroker with a gun stolen from Johnnie's sister Madge's fiance Fred Burke, Fred goes to Sing Sing's death house. Wilson uses all the pressure can to keep Johnnie silent, even after he and Johnnie themselves wind up in the big house.
results.title: You Can't Get Away with Murder

results.overview: A world-famous Anishinaabe musician returns to the reserve to rest and recharge — only to discover that fame (and the outside world) are not easily left behind.
results.title: Falls Around Her

results.original_title: Ich liebe alles, was ich an dir hasse
results.overview: While  out  for  a  walk  in  the  forest  one  day,  Helena, who is in love with her twin sister’s boyfriend, stum-bles upon a group of scientists setting hormone traps. Anyone who is to come in contact with the hormones, falls in love with the first person they see. Well, what if everyone falls in love with the wrong person?
results.title: I love Everything I Hate About You

results.overview: Italy during the Napoleonic wars: A French General and his Adjutant are separated from their unit get beyond the enemy lines. There they meet Carlotta the resolute daughter of an Italian Count, who cannot withstand the charm of the French.
results.title: Seven Guys and a Gal

results.overview: A man, crippled in an accident, returns to the woods after rehabilitation, certain that he'll not see Bigfoot again.
results.title: Abominable

results.original_title: Auch Ninotschka zieht ihr Höschen aus
results.overview: A Russian official and his three female coworkers are mistaken for a pimp and his three prostitutes.
results.title: Even Ninotchka takes off her panties

results.overview: Jessica accepts an invitation to study at the private and exclusive Amityville Academy. After her induction, she realizes that it's a coven of evil witches trying to summon and unleash the demon Botis in order to spread terror throughout the world.
results.title: Witches Of Amityville

results.overview: Mina has everything going for her, but her world is turned upside down when work sends her to her hometown in Tennessee where she must convince an old, stubborn restaurant owner to sell his property. There is just one problem- the restaurant is now owned by her ex-boyfriend Clay, who claims he will never sell. He resists her negotiations every step of the way, and all the while sparks fly.
results.title: Appetite for Love

results.overview: In 1979, while Brazil was going through the troubled moment of the Amnesty Law, Glauber Rocha directed the program Abertura for TV Tupi, in which he interrogated a contradictory and boiling Brazil head-on, full of utopias but always under the weight of secular wounds.
results.title: Race Antenna
